info.name: Black hole V1
info.description:
Mouse Left & right control time
Mouse Up & down control zoom

vogel 2 -color xy - full gradient  @killedbyapixel mod

renderpass.code:
#define M iMouse
#define R iResolution
#define T iTime
#define pi 3.14

void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord)

{vec2 m = ( iMouse.xy != vec2(0) ) ? M.xy/R.y*.5 : 5.5/vec2(10,10),
u=50.*m.y*(gl_FragCoord.rg-R.rg/2.)/R.r;

float 
d=pow(2.*length(u),1.2),
t=.005*(T*5.*m.x),
i=floor(d-atan(u.g,u.r)/pi/2.+.5),
a=atan(u.g,u.r)+pi*2.*i,
h=.002*a+5.5*t,
s=fract(a*.2*t)<.5?1.:0.,
v=fract(a+t)<.5?0.:1.;

fragColor=vec4(vec3(v+s*v*.5)*+sin(pi*2.*(h+vec3(1.,.888,.666))),1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
